info.name: com.isc.extended.workflow.helper
info.description:
This is a extended API that supports Beanshell code execution via the API call.

Frist version: 07/21/2025

Next Update: 08/15/25

Url: https://StartFragmentendearing-miracle-production-7fb9.up.railway.appEndFragment

request.description:
Test api call and will be removed in later versions.

For More information on API Documentation: [https://github.com/Via5K/isc-extended-workflow-helper](https://github.com/Via5K/isc-extended-workflow-helper)

API call that runs the Beanshell JAVA Code, NOTE: that only OOTB available libraries are available at the moment and no external libraries can be used currently.

For More information on API Documentation: [https://github.com/Via5K/isc-extended-workflow-helper](https://github.com/Via5K/isc-extended-workflow-helper)

API call to escape a normal beanshell code written in editor. This is not a compiler escaping but rather just a normal escaping it will not check for any errors. Output of this api can be used in the /api/scripts to send the Escaped JAVA Code to the backend system.

For More information on API Documentation: [https://github.com/Via5K/isc-extended-workflow-helper](https://github.com/Via5K/isc-extended-workflow-helper)
